channel.title: Touch TV Show
channel.description:
I just watched the Pilot episode of the TV Show "Touch". It just came out about 2-3 days ago. Personally i think it is a very good show, and it got me to think about how every little thing in life can be connected, and how one thing can effect something completely different.
Here is the link to watch it. It's on Hulu: [url=http://www.hulu.com/watch/322831/touch-pilot#s-p1-so-i0]http://www.hulu.com/watch/322831/touch-pilot#s-p1-so-i0[/url]
Tell me what you guys think about it. =]
[i][b][u]EDIT:[/u][/b][/i] Episode 2 is also very good. Its also the current one, http://www.hulu.com/watch/341168/touch-113#s-p1-so-i0

item.description:

Jc22493:

What’s the plot?

“BETA episode”

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:3, topic:437415”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=540126.msg3955385#msg3955385 date=1332703886]
What’s the plot?
[/quote]

Not sure I watched the first episode and found it stupid. not to be mean to OP, i just found it very distasteful.[/quote]
People’s opinions i guess.
